title: How do I chat with Google customer service please?
content:
Hi My pixel 3a is broken.
I was told by Google to send it to the Returns team.
Which I did.
It came back to me. The phone was returned to my address by DHL.
Since then I've been waiting for Google to get back to me and they don't.
I don't manage to get hold of them.
Please can you help?
Thanks
Sonia
